description: Provision of office furniture and maintenance services
full_summary:
# Office Furniture bid closed

## Brief overview

The bid for the purchase, delivery, and installation of Office Furniture, specifically chairs, has closed as of October 18th, 2023. However, below are details for reference purposes.

## Details

### Contract
* **Reference Number**: CB-707-73310276
* **Solicitation Number**: 3000768033
* **Amendment Number**: 7
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

### Contract Terms
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 30, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 29, 2024
* **Procurement Category**: Government and Defence (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Contact Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Veterans Affairs Canada
* **Entity Address**: 161 Grafton Street, Charlottetown, PE C1A 8M9, Canada
* **Entity Contact**:
	+ Name: Lynn Paulin
	+ Email: [lynn.paulin@veterans.gc.ca](mailto:lynn.paulin@veterans.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (782) 377-4105
	+ Fax: None

### Technical Details
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Region of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Installation of Region**: None
* **Goods and Services Information Identification Number (GSIN)**: None

### Attachment
The procurement notice and tender description are available from the Canadabuys website under the references below.
* [English notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21557/3000768033---npp.pdf)
* [French notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21557/3000768033---apm.pdf)

I reformatted the original text into appropriate sections and explicitly excluded personal detail apart from essential information. The critical information is formatted in a nice readable format.

In this rewritten piece, I adhered to a professional, concise and simplified version. I also highlighted the Notice availability left in proper web-links than out-dated URLs for next users ease, clarity and duration so with some notice delay there.  



Let me know if this looks good to you. I can make any adjustments if needed.
